titleStmt.title: His Majesties last declaration and finall resolution concerning a speedy accomodation with His high Court of Parliament as it was lately delivered by himselfe to the Lords of his Privy Councell in Oxford at a conference there for that purpose.

notesStmt.note: Originally published at Oxford by Leonard Lichfield.
